remarks: Zero in a product of monoids.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
prdsmndd.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsmndd.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdsmndd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsmndd.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> Mnd ) $.
prds0g $p |- ( ph -> ( 0g o. R ) = ( 0g ` Y ) ) $.
